title: Metabolic response of lettuce (Lactuca sativa L.) to polystyrene nanoplastics and microplastics after foliar exposure
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00233D, Paper
Min Li, Jing-Han Wei, Bing-Ke Wei, Zi-Qi Chen, Hai-Long Liu, Wan-Ying Zhang, Xin-Yu Li, Dong-Mei Zhou
Foliar exposure to polystyrene nanoplastics and microplastics exerted varied effects on the metabolism of lettuce (Lactuca sativa L.).
